column2: Thrilled by his experience with the Avengers, Spiderman returns home to live with his Aunt May.
Four best friends are in for the adventure of a lifetime when they travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival.
A teen thrown back to 1950s with an experiment by his scientiest friend
A screenwriter, while vacationing in Paris with his fiancee ,has taken on tour of a city alone
A marine on an alien planet
A story of an orphaned human boy who guided by animal gurdians and journey of his self-discovery
